name: Add Comments to Code
description: Automatically adds comments to all definitions and important lines when TypeScript, JavaScript, or TSX files are saved

action.prompt:
Please add comprehensive comments to all definitions and important lines in this file. Focus on:

1. Function and method definitions - explain what they do, parameters, and return values
2. Interface and type definitions - describe the purpose and structure
3. Complex logic or algorithms - break down what's happening
4. Important variable declarations - explain their purpose
5. Key configuration objects - document their properties
6. Component props and state - clarify their usage

Maintain the existing code structure and functionality while adding clear, concise comments that help other developers understand the code.
